name: Moon Castle (itch) (RusKom)
description:
Crazy magician, decided to convert to the lunar religion and build a castle in honor of the moon, but he needs to be careful, because he will be interfered by ghosts very similar to him. For defense he will help towers, which as well as the castle should be built from bricks, they can be obtained by breaking the stone blocks, which will be at the same time and the protection from the ghosts.

To walk the character should use the left mouse button, the right mouse button can be used to shoot.

The game was made by two people:

RusKom - programmer and artist.

Chris James - sound designer.
